data.actual_result: The message gets copy-pasted as well as the (edited) part if you're doing it right
data.short_description: You are able to copy the "(edited)" part of a message by hovering over the divider or space of the next message
data.steps_to_repro: - write at least 2 messages in a chat - edit the first message OR edit a message that is not the latest message - highlight the edited message and drag your cursor to the message divider (if the following message was from another person/time) or on the left of the second message [See the cursor placement of the attachments] - ctrl + c and ctrl + v your highlighted message to observe
